title: June Harkrider
text:
I am a fourth-year undergraduate student at the University of Michigan - Ann Arbor studying Linguistics and German. My current project investigates heritage language pragmatics using a novel experimental approach, where I am advised by Savithry Namboodiripad and Ezra Keshet. More broadly, I am interested in experimental semantics and pragmatics, multilingualism, psycholinguistics, and language contact.
You can reach me via email: jhark [at] umich [dot] edu
